# REPL

> REPL environment.


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var repl = require( '@stdlib/repl' );
```

#### repl()

Starts a REPL environment.

``` javascript
var r = repl();
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var repl = require( '@stdlib/repl' );

// Start the REPL:
var r = repl();

// After the REPL has started, exit the process...
setTimeout( onTimeout, 2500 );

function onTimeout() {
    r.close();
}
```

<!-- </examples> -->


<!-- <cli> -->

---

## CLI

<!-- <usage> -->

### Usage

``` bash
Usage: stdlib-repl [options]

Options:

  -h,    --help                Print this message.
  -V,    --version             Print the package version.
```

<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->

### Examples

``` bash
$ stdlib-repl
Starting REPL...
```

<!-- </examples> -->
